DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the potential of a test material to produce a photoallergic response
DOC.criteria: be male or female between the ages of 18 and 60 inclusive be lightly pigmented (Fitzpatrick Skin Type I, II, III) have read and signed the written Informed Consent Form and have completed a HIPAA Authorization Form (Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act) in conformance with 45CFR Parts 160 and 164 be in general good health as determined by the subject's medical history and in the discretion of the investigator have a visible sunburn have a history of sun hypersensitivity/photosensitivity or photosensitive dermatoses have a known hypersensitivity or allergy against any of the active and nonactive ingredients of the investigational products subjects who are employees of the CRO (Contract Research Organization) and/or Bayer or is a household member of an employee
